fullText: The new Broadway musical 'Almost Famous' captures the spirit of Cameron Crowe's beloved 2000 film while adding its own theatrical magic. This rock musical truly rocks when it needs to.
dtliExcerpt: The new Broadway musical 'Almost Famous' captures the spirit of Cameron Crowe's beloved 2000 film while adding its own theatrical magic. This rock musical truly rocks when it needs to.
bwwExcerpt: Those classic bits are all still here, yes, but they're a wisp of the original. British director Jeremy Herrin, who should stick to plays and steer clear of Stratocasters, composer-lyricist Tom Kitt and book writer-lyricist Crowe do not present a compelling case for why the film must be a Broadway musical. It's pleasant and sweet and passes the time, sure, but should that be enough?
